full_summary:
# Stage 2 - Iron Gates Tunnel Renovations – Kootenay National Park
==================================================================================

## Solicitation Information
-----------------------------------------------------------------

### Title
*English:* Stage 2 - Iron Gates Tunnel Renovations
*French:* Phase 2 – Rénovation du tunnel Iron Gates

### Reference Number
cb-6998-35224299

### Solicitation Number
*English:* 5P468-23-0084/A
*French:* 5P468-23-0084/A

## Tender Details
-----------------------------------------------------------------

### Tender Closing Date
2023-07-14T16:00:00

### Expected Contract Start Date
2023-07-19

### Expected Contract End Date
2023-09-30

## Procurement Information
---------------------------------------------------

### Notice Type
*English:* Request for Proposal
*French:* Demande de propositions

### Procurement Method
*English:* Competitive - Selective tendering
*French:* Concurrentielle - Appel d'offres sélectif

## Contract Details
-----------------------------------------------------------------

### Contracting Entity
Parks Canada
220 - 4 Avenue SE, Suite 720
Calgary, AB T2G 4X3
Canada

### Contact Information
*English:* Jen Maheu
*jennifer.maheu@pc.gc.ca*
(587) 432-8458

### Summary
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Parks Canada is inviting qualified suppliers to submit a financial bid for the Stage 2 - Iron Gates Tunnel Renovations project in Kootenay National Park. The project involves renovations to the Iron Gates Tunnel, including masonry repair/replacement and localized repairs to the concrete substructure. Only qualified suppliers who have completed the first stage of the two-stage solicitation process have been invited to bid. The expected contract start date is 2023-07-19 and the expected contract end date is 2023-09-30. Suppliers are required to meet specific requirements outlined in the solicitation documents. Please refer to the solicitation documents for further details and submission guidelines. ](endex)collapseidosistarri)
